DOC.brief_summary: Allergy and Asthma study of children (3 - 7 Years of age) who participated in randomized trials of supplemented infant formula during infancy conducted by The Retina Foundation of the Southwest .
DOC.brief_title: Allergy and Ashthma in Children Who Were Fed Supplemented Infant Formula
DOC.criteria: Children who participated in randomized trials of supplemented infant formula conducted by The Retina Foundation of the Southwest during infancy
